properties.areaDesc: Latimer, OK; Haskell, OK; Pittsburg, OK
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 3:05PM CST until January 10 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southwestern Haskell County in southeastern Oklahoma...
Northwestern Latimer County in southeastern Oklahoma...
Southeastern Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma...

* Until 345 PM CST.

* At 305 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from 2 miles southeast of Blocker to 6 miles south of
Hartshorne, moving northeast at 50 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations in or near the path include...
Wilburton...                      Stigler...
Hartshorne...                     Quinton...
Kinta...                          Higgins...
Damon...                          Robbers Cave State Park...
Haileyville...                    Gowen...
Panola...                         Dow...
Featherston...                    Lewisville...
properties.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
